item.title: Top CDC Officials Resign After Director Is Pushed Out
item.description: The exodus has set off alarms among staff at the US Centers for Disease Control and Prevention: “My main concern is they will be replaced with puppets...

item.title: With India’s corporate banking lagging decades behind consumer fintech, TransBnk raises $25M to bridge the gap
item.description: TransBnk has raised $25 million in a round led by Bessemer Venture Partners to digitize India’s corporate banking.

item.title: Nvidia reports record sales as the AI boom continues
item.description: Nvidia's revenue hit $46.7 billion in the second quarter, a 56% increase compared to the same period last year.

item.title: Google launches new device protection program called Pixel Care+
item.description: Google says Pixel Care+ provides a "higher level of coverage, service and peace of mind for Google hardware owners."

item.title: 911 centers are so understaffed, they’re turning to AI to answer calls
item.description: The company offers an AI voice assistant that helps 911 centers handle non-emergency calls.
